name: Unblock Gridlock
description:
Unblock Gridlock is an addictive digital modernization of classic sliding block puzzle games. Play through story mode and help save traffic town from their radical mayor or relax and solve one of the over 9000 free play puzzles.



Features
  • Solve traffic jams in story mode to save the town folk from a new traffic policy that’s removed all traffic lights.
  • Over 9000 Levels across 4 difficulty ranges (6969 Easy, 1337 Medium, 666 Hard, 420 Expert)
  • Thousands of hours of brain teasing content
  • Additional Free Levels added regularly
